body: The bald, Ichiro, doesn't like being blackmailed. Neither does he like that father's attitude to him, nor to the eldest daughter, Miyuki, whom the father believe is born from his wife's affair with other man. But Ichiro's position in this is weak. At least in the end, it seems like preparation for a payback is done. Volume 4 will be final.

Man this artist really stopped making good stuff after the sister incest series. It's all so bland and rapy for weirdos. But I guess as long is it makes cheap money it works. Sad. Because they made some really good shit sometimes. Oh well, there are many more artist who actually put effort in their works.
